Text: How is it possible to have a torrent uploaded 12:29 and 5 minutes later have 240 senders?  Is this real?

The skull means it's real.

Have a read about how the site works. 

To avoid fakes and shite stick to DLing from skull-ed uploaders (either colour) and you'll be fine.
Side By Side sucks for passive 3D TV, they should do TOP/BOTTOM
